abstract.t: This document defines a mechanism to augment the LDAPv3 [RFC2251]search operation through an LDAP search control for sending a partial search entry to an LDAP client as result of a search operation in the SearchResultEntry LDAP PDU. This mechanism lets the LDAP client specify size and time limits to be applied to the server-side processing of a single SearchResultEntry. This document defines two LDAP controls required to support the above requirement.
